about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Flip-Map - Classic Theater


Heroes enjoy being the center of attention, so what better place for adventure than on stage at the theater? This line of gaming maps provides ready-to-use and captivatingly detailed fantasy set pieces for the busy Game Master. Whether the adventurers are just eager for a night's entertainment as audience members or are on a mission against a sinister production or a raid against a rival theatrical band, with Pathfinder Flip-Mat Classics: Theater, you'll be ready for the curtain call in a heartbeat!
The most-popular Pathfinder Flip-Mats in history return! These fan-favorite maps feature versatile adventure settings--city streets, forests, ships, taverns, and more--and now, these essential adventure set pieces are sure to bring excitement to your game table for years to come!

 NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds

This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"

Heroes enjoy being the center of attention, so what better place for adventure than on stage at the theater? The most-popular Pathfinder Flip-Mats in history return! These fan-favorite maps feature versatile adventure settings--city streets, forests, ships, taverns, and more--and now, these essential adventure set pieces are sure to bring excitement to your game table for years to come!

 NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
